title: Stage Lv10-S27
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The atmosphere suggests it's not the right time to say it.
The situation is a bit delicate. We should approach it carefully.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 분위기상 지금은 말하기 좀 그런 것 같아.
sentences.en: The atmosphere suggests it's not the right time to say it.

sentences.kr: 상황이 좀 미묘해. 조심스럽게 접근해야 할 것 같아.
sentences.en: The situation is a bit delicate. We should approach it carefully.

sentences.kr: 타이밍이 절묘하네. 이보다 좋을 순 없어.
sentences.en: The timing is perfect. It couldn't be better.

sentences.kr: 뭔가 어정쩡한 상태야. 확실히 하고 싶은데.
sentences.en: It's in a somewhat ambiguous state. I'd like to clarify it.

sentences.kr: 공기가 좀 무거워. 뭔가 일어날 것 같아.
sentences.en: The air feels heavy. Something seems about to happen.

sentences.kr: 상황이 좀 애매해졌네. 어떻게 해야 할지 모르겠어.
sentences.en: The situation has become a bit unclear. I don't know what to do.

sentences.kr: 분위기를 봐서는, 지금이 기회인 것 같아.
sentences.en: Reading the room, I think now's the opportunity.

sentences.kr: 좀 이상한 흐름인데? 뭔가 바뀐 것 같아.
sentences.en: The flow seems a bit strange? Something seems to have changed.
